info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 8:38PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Robeson and northwestern Columbus Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 838 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Evergreen, or 12 miles west of Whiteville, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chadbourn, Fair Bluff, Boardman, Evergreen, Cherry Grove and Cerro Gordo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
